idea:
We have started with a business solution for Indian retailers which has now morphed into an online ordering  platform for local shops. We are providing a mobile based technology platform for local shopkeepers like: Grocery, Vegetables & Fruits, Dairy, Restaurants,
Bakery, etc. End customers can place the order directly to the shopkeeper via our mobile
app. Delivery is done by the shopkeeper's staff. Our platform is helping the local shopkeepers to bring their  stores online. 300+ Merchants in 24 cities have seen an increase in daily orders even during this unprecedented time. They are valuing this platform for:
1. Possibility of using their own staff for delivery
2. Flat charge based ordering fee (not hefty one like that of many other online platforms)
The proposition has attracted merchants from even those categories
which are not presently listed on our  platform.
name: WISELAP TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Growcer - Driving growth of  Grocery Retailer Community with technology and digitisation.
